about_the_game:
Sharing your gaming experience, E-sports challenges or Let’s play videos on all the platforms has never been so fast and easy.
Movie Studio has a powerful video engine for faster-rendering speed.
Explore the large toolbox full of innovative features for transitions, effects, titles, sound design, graphics, animations, and so much more.

A POWERHOUSE FOR YOUR CREATIVITY

INFUSION Engine 2
The engine that powers Movie Studio builds on native hardware support for graphics cards by Intel, NVIDIA and AMD. The result is instant and seamless previews without the need for proxy files or time-consuming rendering.

YOUR PERSONAL CREATIVE TOOLBOX

Your fully customizable workspace adapts to your preferences and gives you everything you need at a glance - making the most of your screen setup. Effortlessly explore a large toolbox full of innovative features for transitions, effects, titles, sound design, graphics, animations, and so much more.

Adjust colour, stabilize shaky images or apply layer masks with simple yet effective options - including an impressive wizard for whenever you need perfect results in a blink of an eye.

Only available in English (please note that if you already own Video Deluxe this product is similar)

HIGHLIGHTS

  • Up to 900 effects, titles, templates & transitions*
  • Easy colour correction
  • Professional image stabilization
  • Burn DVDs & Blu-ray discs
  • INFUSION Engine 2 for unparalleled performance
  • Edit and export 8K Ultra HD Video

*Many of these effects and templates are paid add-ons which must be bought in the store.

name: Movie Studio 18 Steam Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 | 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard, minimum resolution 1280 x 768
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Internal sound card
  • Additional Notes: Supported import formats Video: (DV-)AVI, HEVC/H.265*, M(2)TS, MJPEG, MKV, MOV, MPEG-1/2/4, MXV, VOB, WMV(HD) Audio: MIDI, MP3, OGG, Surround sound/5.1, WAV, WMA Image: BMP, GIF, JPEG, TGA, TIF Supported export formats Disc: DVD, Blu-ray Disc, AVCHD disc Video: (DV-)AVI, HEVC/H.265*, MJPEG, MOV, MPEG-1/2/4, MXV, WMV(HD) Audio: MP3, Surround sound/5.1, WAV Image: BMP, JPEG *HEVC encoding requires fee-based activation. MP3 export requires installation of Windows Media Player Version 10 or higher.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 | 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated, at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Multi-channel sound card recommended for surround sound editing
  • Additional Notes: Some advanced program functions demand more of your computer's processing power. To get the most from these functions, your system should at least meet the recommended requirements. Check your operating system’s control panel for technical information about your computer.

short_description: Simplicity is key with Movie Studio: From importing your media with simple drag and drop to using the most advanced features. No matter your skills or knowledge, editing your videos should always be intuitive and fun. Use the automatic workflows, or explore infinite creative possibilities.
